P

Paragraphe - Class in beans
It is a model class in order to represent paragraphs
Paragraphe() - Constructor for class beans.Paragraphe
 
ParagrapheDAO - Class in dao
This is a DAO class that interacts with the data base concerning the paragraphs treatments
ParagrapheDAO(DataSource) - Constructor for class dao.ParagrapheDAO
 
ParticipantFilter - Class in filters
 
ParticipantFilter() - Constructor for class filters.ParticipantFilter
 
participants(String) - Method in class dao.HistoireDAO
 
parWroteBy(String) - Method in class dao.ParagrapheDAO
allows to retrieve all the paragraphs written by a given user
Publier - Class in servlets
 
Publier() - Constructor for class servlets.Publier
 
publish_story(String) - Method in class dao.HistoireDAO
to publish a story (reading mode) : change the corresponding boolean in the database
publishForWriting(String) - Method in class dao.HistoireDAO
allows to indicate in the data base that the story is public for writing
